targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("resource_name" =~ /^$resource_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("resource_name" =~ /^$resource_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.description: Sum of all the inbound traffic over the time range.

targets.query: SELECT sum(non_negative_derivative) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_recv"), $__interval) FROM "net" WHERE ("resource_name" =~ /^$resource_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "interface" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Inbound traffic

panels.description: Sum of all the outbound traffic over the time range.

targets.query: SELECT sum(non_negative_derivative) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("bytes_sent"), $__interval) FROM "net" WHERE ("resource_name" =~ /^$resource_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "interface" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Outbound traffic

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_system") + mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("resource_name" =~ /^$resource_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.description: Number of deadlocks and conflicts per database.
panels.title: Deadlocks & conflicts

panels.description: Rate per minute of fetched,inserted,updated and deleted tuples.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_fetched"), 1m) FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("resource_name" =~ /^$resource_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "db" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_inserted"), 1m) FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("resource_name" =~ /^$resource_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "db" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_updated"), 1m) FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("resource_name" =~ /^$resource_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "db" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_deleted"), 1m) FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("resource_name" =~ /^$resource_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "db" fill(null)

panels.title: Tuples/minute (fetched,inserted,updated,deleted)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("xact_commit"), 1s) FROM "postgresql" WHERE ("resource_name" =~ /^$resource_name$/ AND "host" =~ /^$node$/ AND "db" =~ /^$db$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "db" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "postgresql" WITH KEY = "resource_name"
list.label: cluster_id
list.name: resource_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "postgresql" WITH KEY = "resource_name"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "postgresql" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE resource_name =~ /$resource_name/ LIMIT 100
list.label: node
list.name: node
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "postgresql" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE resource_name =~ /$resource_name/ AND host !~ /restore.*/  AND time > now() -1h AND time < now() LIMIT 100

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "postgresql" WITH KEY = "db" WHERE resource_name =~ /$resource_name/ LIMIT 100
list.label: database
list.name: db
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "postgresql" WITH KEY = "db" WHERE resource_name =~ /$resource_name/ LIMIT 100
